name: My Friend Bob Wants A Burger
name_original: My Friend Bob Wants A Burger
description:
A  hand-drawn point and click adventure with HyR0 and Bob..
made for the GDevelop GameJam #2, with the theme Pets and/or Companions!
Let's see if you can get the good ending :-)

UPDATE: Now with Mobile support!
Just click on the "press space" and the "X" icons and you'll be good to go! :-)

Liluo.io link:

https://liluo.io/games/2d6cf0b8-62c9-4191-a1ee-4777664cfe22
